radiographic_examinations.findings: pulmonary venous hypertension, atelectasis in the base of the left lung, a small pleural effusion on the left side, and mild cardiomegaly
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: moderate cardiomegaly that had increased since a study that was performed 7 months earlier

radiographic_examinations.findings: no evidence of bowel obstruction or perforation
